parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma1

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Returns a structured text, containing an image or name (if no image is found) of the button, on the keyboard, mouse or joystick, with the given code.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> '''keyImage''' dikCode

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> dikCode: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Structured Text]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_name = [[keyImage]] 28; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>result is "Enter"</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[keyName]], [[actionKeys]], [[actionKeysImages]], [[actionKeysNames]], [[actionKeysNamesArray]], [[DIK KeyCodes]]
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>ofpe</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
